amendment.description: Amendment modifies the exemption levels of EPA's "Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure" rules for small farmers and ranchers and requires producers to construct a containment facility around above-ground oil tanks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 56 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to modify the exemption levels of EPA's SPCC rules for small farmers and ranchers and require producers to construct a containment facility around above-ground oil tanks.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
